title: Jared Fogle
summary: Jared Scott Fogle[3] (/ˈfoʊɡəl/; born August 23, 1977)[1] is an American former spokesman for Subway restaurants. After attributing significant weight loss to eating Subway sandwiches, Fogle appeared in the company's advertising campaigns from 2000 to 2015. His tenure came to an abrupt end following an FBI investigation that saw him convicted of traveling to pay for sex with minors and possessing child pornography.
